conbody.p: New oXygen author v18.1 is adapted with following major features:

li.p: First of all an <imagemap> element is needed to be inserted and then an inner <image>
On clicking the <imagemap>or <image> we get the Image Map Editor option in the context menu,

Form controls with dropdown extended for the <section> to enable user to define all relevant attribute definitions without having to open the separate attribute dialog. Minor fine tunings are done for other elements as well.
Insert External Link... is now enabled for <keydef> element in <bookmap>
Removed submenu itemsu can test..no need to show code now...u insert Insert variable from map and Insert external link from map from XML menu
